database.name: VIEW ESCM_ORDERRELEASE_V
database.view: SELECT rel.c_orderline_id AS escm_orderrelease_v_id, rel.ad_client_id, rel.ad_org_id, rel.isactive, now() AS created, rel.createdby, now() AS updated, rel.updatedby, rel.c_order_id, rel.c_bpartner_id, rel.c_currency_id, rel.c_tax_id, rel.c_uom_id, rel.dateordered, rel.em_efin_amtinvoiced, rel.em_efin_bud_encumlines_id, rel.em_efin_c_validcombination_id, rel.em_efin_failure_reason, rel.em_efin_funds_available, rel.em_efin_legacy_deliveredqty, rel.em_efin_m_requisitionline_id, rel.em_efin_uniquecodename, rel.em_escm_acctno, rel.em_escm_agreement_line AS c_orderline_id, rel.em_escm_amt_delivered, rel.em_escm_amtreturned, rel.em_escm_canceldate, rel.em_escm_canceled, rel.em_escm_cancelledby, rel.em_escm_cancelreason, rel.em_escm_comments, rel.em_escm_complete_percen, rel.em_escm_ismanual, rel.em_escm_issummarylevel, rel.em_escm_line_taxamt, rel.em_escm_line_total_updated, rel.em_escm_nationalproduct, rel.em_escm_needbydate, rel.em_escm_old_orderline, rel.em_escm_parentline_id, rel.em_escm_po_change_factor, rel.em_escm_po_change_type, rel.em_escm_po_change_value, rel.em_escm_podiscount, rel.em_escm_podiscountamount, rel.em_escm_prodescription, rel.em_escm_product_category_id, rel.em_escm_proposalmgmt_id, rel.em_escm_qty_accepted, rel.em_escm_qty_delivered, rel.em_escm_qty_due, rel.em_escm_qtycanceled, rel.em_escm_receipt_delay, rel.em_escm_releaseamt, rel.em_escm_releaseqty, rel.line, rel.linenetamt, rel.m_product_id, rel.m_warehouse_id, rel.priceactual, rel.qtyordered, (SELECT lne.c_orderline_id FROM c_orderline lne JOIN c_order hdr ON hdr.c_order_id = lne.c_order_id WHERE (lne.em_escm_agreement_line IN (SELECT c_orderline.c_orderline_id FROM c_orderline WHERE (c_orderline.c_order_id IN (SELECT c_order.c_order_id FROM c_order WHERE c_order.em_escm_ordertype = 'PUR_AG' AND c_order.em_escm_appstatus = 'ESCM_AP')))) AND hdr.em_escm_ordertype = 'PUR_REL' AND hdr.em_escm_appstatus = 'ESCM_AP' AND lne.c_orderline_id = rel.c_orderline_id) AS releaseline FROM c_orderline rel JOIN c_order ord ON ord.c_order_id = rel.c_order_id WHERE rel.em_escm_agreement_line IS NOT NULL AND ord.em_escm_appstatus = 'ESCM_AP'
